values: 阶段；时期；相位；位相；相角；发展时期；月相；周期性变化的状态；（月亮的）盈亏
分阶段实行；逐步执行；使同步；调整相位；逐渐引入；使定相

affix_sense_info.affix_sense_chinese: 显示(=show), 引申词义为相位, 阶段

word_mean_info__list.difference: 着重以特定观点对事物进行观察或考虑。
可与aspect和phase换用，但更着重构成事物全貌的一个或多个方面。
指可以对事物进行观察或描述或考虑的任何方面。
专指从某一角度去观察、考虑事物的某个方面。

word_group.brief_definition: 不同相的；不同步的；不协调的
逐步引进；逐步实施；分阶段引入
初期阶段；初始阶段；初始相位

bilingual.source: The project is in its initial phase.
The company is in a growth phase right now.
bilingual.target: 公司现在处于增长阶段。

bilingual.source: This drug is still in the experimental phase.
bilingual.target: 这种药物仍处于实验的阶段。

bilingual.source: The city is in a phase of rapid development.
bilingual.target: 这个城市处于快速发展的阶段。

bilingual.source: The negotiations are in a touchy phase right now.
bilingual.target: 谈判现在处于一个敏感阶段。

bilingual.source: This phase of the plan requires careful planning.
bilingual.target: 计划的这个阶段需要仔细规划。

bilingual.source: They are in the final phase of clinical trials.
bilingual.target: 他们正处于临床试验的最后阶段。

bilingual.source: The initial phase of the project is very important.
bilingual.target: 这个项目的初始阶段非常重要。

bilingual.source: The beta phase is crucial for identifying bugs.
bilingual.target: 测试版阶段对于发现漏洞至关重要。

bilingual.source: Middle age is an important phase in a person's life.
bilingual.target: 中年是一个人生活中的重要阶段。

list.abstract: 《phase》是砂音铃创作的其它漫画类漫画。

yingyinNormal.zh: 第二阶段是用无人机。修理工。

yingyinNormal.en: Boy Band Island? That's just a phase.
yingyinNormal.zh: 男生乐队岛？那只是一个阶段。

yingyinNormal.en: Right. She's in the "I only want Mommy" Phase. And me and Erin.
yingyinNormal.zh: 是的她现在正处于只要妈妈的阶段，还有我和艾琳。

yingyinNormal.en: Go on phase two. Years of mandated hiding and silence have made us bitter.
yingyinNormal.zh: 进入第二阶段。多年来的躲藏和静默让我们萌生出不满。

yingyinNormal.en: Now, I meant to tell you, the Smart Blood program is obviously still in its developmental phase.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我想告诉你，智能血液程序很显然还在研发阶段。

yingyinNormal.en: We are very excited to be launching 10x10x10 to bring HeForShe into its next phase.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我们怀着激动的心情发起10x10x10，引领HeForShe行动进入下一阶段。
yingyinNormal.videoNameZh: 《艾玛·沃特森达沃斯世界经济论坛HeForShe演讲》

yingyinNormal.en: She's just going through a phase. We all went through it. And apparently, some of us still are in it.
yingyinNormal.zh: 她只不过处于一个特定阶段，我们都经历过，而且看起来，我们中有人还深陷其中。

yingyinNormal.en: However, we also believe that the universe had another phase of de Sitter expansion in the earliest times of its life.
yingyinNormal.zh: 然而，我们也相信宇宙还存在另一个德西特膨胀阶段，它发生在宇宙形成的初期。

yingyinNormal.en: We call the accelerating end state of the universe a de Sitter phase, named after the Dutch mathematician Willem de Sitter.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我们称宇宙的加速最终状态为德西特阶段，这是根据荷兰数学家威廉?德西特命名的。

yingyinNormal.en: Oh, I'm glad you guys are past that little awkward phase.
Killing the Chancellor tonight was a statement the start of a new phase.
yingyinNormal.zh: 今晚刺杀总统的行动，就是一个声明，宣告一个新时代的开启。

yingyinNormal.en: The mayor tried to get the factory to phase out their diesel generators.
yingyinNormal.zh: 市长想让工厂淘汰现有的柴油发电机。

yingyinNormal.en: Well, that's true. That one never really went through a rebellious phase.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你说得没错，她基本没有叛逆期。

yingyinNormal.en: You were timing me? Yes. I am going through a bit of a timing phase. How long will it last? We'll find out.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你在给我计时吗？没错。我最近特别沉迷于计时。这个爱好会持续多久呢？让我们开始计时吧。

yingyinNormal.en: She's also in this phase where if you leave the room, she screams bloody murder, but thanks, you guys. Have fun.
yingyinNormal.zh: 这时期的她还会在你离开房间的时候大叫，但是谢谢你们，祝你们玩的开心。

yingyinNormal.en: I decided that my mother views me as a child because I never went through a rebellious phase, so, I got an earring.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我觉得我妈一贯把我当小孩子看是因为我从来没经历过青春叛逆期，于是我去打了耳洞。

yingyinNormal.en: You good? Yeah, I'm good, I'm good. Kevin? Yeah? Mom and Dad didn't raise no whores. Except briefly, during Kate's eyeliner phase. Yeah. Night, little brother. Night, big brother.
yingyinNormal.zh: 好点了吗？我很好，我很好。凯文。怎么？爸妈可没养过什么妓女，除了凯特画眼线搞叛逆那段时间。是啊。晚安，弟弟。晚安，哥哥。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2012-2023年12年间全国考研试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2012-2023年全国考研英语一和考研英语二共24套考研试卷，包括阅读、完型填空、翻译、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选全国考研考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2012-2023年12年间全国考研英语一和考研英语二试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

sense_info_list.en: a distinct stage in a series of events or a process of change or development

examination_example.sentence: Ferraro analyzed satellite data showing annual forest loss from 2008 to 2012—including during Indonesia's <highlight>phase</highlight>-in of the antipoverty program—in 7,468 forested villages across 15 provinces.
examination_example.sentence_trans: Ferraro分析了2008年至2012年期间每年森林损失显示的卫星数据——包括印度尼西亚在15个省份的7468个森林村庄逐步实施脱贫计划期间的数据。

examination_example.sentence: I assumed that <highlight>phase</highlight> was something experts developed after years of research into children's behaviour: wrong.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我原以为该阶段（学步期）是专家们经过多年研究儿童行为后发展出来的词汇：错。

examination_example.sentence: In 2007, Indonesia started <highlight>phasing</highlight> in a program that gives money to its poorest residents under certain conditions.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 2007年，印尼开始分阶段实施一项计划，在一定条件下向最贫困的居民提供资金。

affix_sense_info.affix_sense_chinese: 显示(=show), 引申词义为相位, 阶段

word_usage.usage: phase作动词时，为及物动词，其后可接名词或代词，常用于被动结构，如：The new tax will be phased in over two years. 新税将在两年内逐步实施。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

sense_info_list.en: a distinct stage in a series of events or a process of change or development

examination_example.sentence: Entrepreneurial teams generally progress through three <highlight>phases</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 创业团队通常会经历三个阶段。

examination_example.sentence: In the second <highlight>phase</highlight>, as they grow wealthier, they pave the roads, allowing traffic to move faster and pushing up the death rate.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 到第二个阶段，随着他们变得富裕，他们铺路使交通速度更快，从而推高了死亡率。

examination_example.sentence: Lastly, in the third <highlight>phase</highlight>, countries act to make their roads safer.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 最后，在第三阶段，各国采取行动，使道路更加安全。

sense_info_list.en: each of the aspects of the moon or a planet, according to the amount of its illumination, especially the new moon, the first quarter, the full moon, and the last quarter

affix_sense_info.affix_sense_chinese: 显示(=show), 引申词义为相位, 阶段

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全四级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

sense_info_list.en: a distinct stage in a series of events or a process of change or development

examination_example.sentence: Byun Young-in chairs Songdo real estate association and started selling property here when the first <highlight>phase</highlight> of the city opened in 2005.
examination_example.sentence_trans: Byun Young-in 松岛房地产协会的会长，2005年松岛城一期开盘时，他就开始在这里销售房产。

examination_example.sentence: Parents regard it as the first <highlight>phase</highlight> of children's development.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 父母认为它是孩子成长的第一阶段。

examination_example.sentence: The third grade marks a new <highlight>phase</highlight> of learning.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 三年级标志着学习的新阶段。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2015-2022年全国卷高考试卷，包括阅读、完形、单选、填空、听力、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。
